campaign: Q1 2026 Product Launch - AI Analytics Dashboard
description: Comprehensive marketing campaign for launching our new AI-powered analytics dashboard targeting enterprise customers. Focus on data-driven decision making, ease of use, and ROI.

deliverables.title: Product landing page - Main hero and features
deliverables.description: Primary landing page for the product launch. Should emphasize the pain points of traditional analytics tools and position our AI-powered solution as the modern alternative.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section with benefit-driven headline addressing analytics complexity
3 feature sections highlighting AI capabilities, ease of use, and ROI
Customer pain points addressed (slow insights, complex setup, poor UX)
Social proof section with 2-3 customer logos
deliverables.notes: This is the foundation - all other deliverables will link here

deliverables.title: Welcome email series for trial signups
deliverables.description: 3-email nurture sequence for users who start a free trial. Progressive education on features with gentle conversion nudges.
acceptanceCriteria: Email 3: Conversion nudge with limited-time offer
CTAs link to specific dashboard features
Subject lines included for each email
deliverables.notes: Coordinate with product team on onboarding flow URLs

deliverables.title: Launch week social media posts - LinkedIn
deliverables.description: 5-post series for LinkedIn announcing the product launch. Mix of formats: announcement, feature spotlight, customer story, ROI data, call-to-action.
deliverables.notes: Schedule posts M-F during launch week

deliverables.title: Thought leadership: The Future of Analytics is AI-Powered
deliverables.description: Long-form blog post positioning our product launch within the broader trend toward AI-powered business intelligence. Educational with subtle product mentions.
acceptanceCriteria: Structure: problem → market trends → solution approach → our product (subtle)
Includes 2-3 data points/statistics about analytics market
At least one expert quote or industry insight
2-3 mentions of our product (natural, not salesy)
CTA: Download white paper or start trial
deliverables.notes: Publish 1 week before launch to build anticipation

deliverables.title: Product launch announcement - Existing customer base
deliverables.description: Newsletter to existing customers announcing new product. Emphasize value for current users and migration path.
acceptanceCriteria: Highlights new features relevant to existing users
Clear migration path or upgrade instructions
Special offer for existing customers (early access or discount)

deliverables.title: Beta customer success story - 40% faster insights
deliverables.description: Detailed case study of beta customer who achieved significant results. Use real data and quotes.
acceptanceCriteria: Specific metrics: '40% faster time-to-insights', 'reduced analysis time by 15 hours/week'
Direct quotes from customer (3-4 quotes minimum)
CTA: 'See how we can help you'
deliverables.notes: Customer: TechCorp Inc. Contact: Jane Smith for quotes
